amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to reserve surpluses for debt reduction, a prescription drug benefit, education and social services programs, and specified tax credits.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 2 printed in part B of H. Rept. 106-535 to recommend $276.2 billion in budget authority and $274.5 billion in outlays for national defense; propose $30 million in budget authority and $22.3 billion in outlays for community and regional development; recommend $85.9 billion in budget authority and $74.8 billion in outlays for education, training, employment, and social services; propose using additional non-Social Security surpluses to create a Medicare prescription drug benefit; and to recommend targeted tax cuts, such as expanding the EITC and increasing the Dependent Care Tax Credit.

action.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. DeFazio.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 61 - 351 (Roll no. 71).
